description.en: The content of the course is the work of master students on their individual research topic or research project, including work with literature and presentation of their results on scientific seminars and conferences, and lissening of regular scientific seminars in the faculty. The credits are given during the 2-year study period according to the results.
description.et: Aine sisuks on magistrantide töö individuaalse teadusteema või uurimisprojektiga ja tutvumine selleks vajaliku erialase kirjandusega, tulemuste esitamine seminaridel ja konverentsidel, ning teaduskonnas toimuvate regulaarsete teadusseminaride kuulamine. Punktid antakse töö tulemuslikkuse põhjal 2 aasta jooksul.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to introduce master students to the research results of their specialty, but also to neighboring specialties, as well as various theoretical and methodological problems of wider interest. In addition, the course develops your master's thesis, reasoning skills, and scientific presentation. Students gain experience in the correct and engaging presentation of their research, both as articles and as presentations.
objectives.et: Käeoleva kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvustada magistrantidele eelkõige oma eriala, aga ka naabererialade uurimistulemusi, samuti mitmesuguseid laiemat huvi pakkuvaid teoreetilisi ning metoodilisi probleeme. Lisaks arendatakse kursuse käigus oma magistritööd, arutlemisoskust ja teadusliku ettekande tegemist. Tudengid omandavad kogemuse oma teadustöö korrektsest ja köitvast esitamisest nii artiklitena kui ettekannetena.

learning_outcomes.en: The student having passed the subject: 1. Is able to prepare and present the results of his / her research both orally and in writing and to develop scientific discussion in his / her specialty; 2. Knows the general rules of writing articles and is able to produce a scientific article based on his / her data; 3. The student will be familiar with the main programs and technical tools used for writing presentations and writing articles. 4. Knows the guidelines and vocabulary for writing articles in various scientific journals. 5. Can orientate himself / herself in the scientific literature and critically evaluate previously published data in the context of his / her research. 5. Can understand and present scientific results published by others.
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinud üliõpilane: 1. Oskab koostada ja esitleda oma teadustöö tulemusi nii suuliselt kui kirjalikult ning arendada teaduslikku diskussiooni oma erialal; 2. Teab artiklite kirjutamise üldreegleid ja suudab koostada teaduslikku artiklit oma andmete alusel; 3. Üliõpilane tunneb peamisi ettekannete koostamiseks ja artiklite kirjutamiseks kasutatavaid programme ja tehnilisi abivahendeid. 4. Tunneb erinevate teadusajakirjade artiklite koostamise juhiseid ja sellealast sõnavara. 5. Suudab orienteeruda teaduskirjanduses ning kriitiliselt hinnata varasemalt avaldatud andmeid oma teadustöö kontekstis. 5. Suudab aru saada ja esitada ka teiste poolt publitseeritud teadustulemusi.

grade_evaluation.et: Arvestuse saamiseks on vaja teha seminaris ettekanne.
